summary: A standalone Serana replacer with custom Combat AI.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[color=#ffe599]Read [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/articles/50240/]this[/url] article to update from my old follower mod Venette To Venetia Serana. DO NOT LOAD THEM TOGETHER.[/color][/center]
[center][youtube]yIYBHLUNM3c[/youtube][youtube]yaRCLCc0pNU[/youtube][/center]
[line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]About Mod[/font][/size][/color]

This is a STANDALONE REPLACER for Serana with Custom Combat AI.
[line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]Features[/font][/size][/color]

[list][*][b]TBBP HDT bodies[/b] to get those things jiggling ![/*]
[*][b]HD tintmasks[/b] (makeup).[/*]
[*][b]Leveled vampire cloak spells and unarmed damage boost[/b].[/*]
[*][i]Common Files[/i] contains options for [b]Alternate Hair[/b], [b]Alternate Eyes[/b]. [i]Body Files[/i] contains option for [b]Dry Textures[/b].[/*]
[*]and much more....[/*]
[/list][line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]AI[/font][/size][/color]

- Goes invisible and moves quietly when sneaking.
- Raises dead bodies before she visits the soul cairn. Conjures undead after her visit to soul cairn.
- Uses melee weapons in range, spells when out of range.
- Has 10% chance to cast Mist Form (at day) and Bat Form (at night) on herself effectively avoiding damage for 2 secs.
- Has 20% chance to kill an opponent with Vampire Power Bite attack when its below 25% health.
[line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]Installation[/font][/size][/color]

1. Download [i]Common Files[/i] from STEP-1 and extract it manually or activate it via manager.
2. Download one of the [i]Body Files[/i] from STEP-2 and extract it manually or activate it via manager.
3. Activate data-file Venetia Serana.esp manually or via manager.
[line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]Updating[/font][/size][/color]

1. Dismiss her from your followers in-game. If you are in a interior location then go outside. If you are in a exterior location then fast travel to somewhere else. Save your game. Quit the game.
2. Now download the updated files and overwrite with the existing files. Go in the game and check if its working properly.
[line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]Uninstallation[/font][/size][/color]

1. Type "stopquest tpVenetteAIQuest" in console.
2. Dismiss her from your followers in-game. If you are in a interior location then go outside. If you are in a exterior location then fast travel to somewhere else. Save your game. Quit the game.
3. Deactivate the [i]Venetia Serana Common Files[/i] and [i]Venetia Serana Body Files[/i] then delete them.
[line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]Compatibility[/font][/size][/color]

NOT compatible with any mod that alters appearance of Serana.
COMPATIBLE with Sneaky Serana
[line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]Recommended[/font][/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15508/?]Better Fast Travel - Carriages and Ships - Overhauled[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=352382488]Amazing Race Tweaks[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019/?]Follower Commentary Overhaul - FCO[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13798/?]Follower Map Markers[/url]
[line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]Mods Used For Screenshots[/font][/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]FaceLight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802]Climates Of Tamriel[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450]Realistic Lighting Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936]RealVision ENB[/url]
Pinup Poser S
[line]
[color=#ffa07a][size=4][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]My Mods[/font][/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2632143/?tb=mods&pUp=1#]Venetia Serana
Celestine Healer Custom AI
Auto Recharge Weapons
Auto Consume Potions
Crowd Control Extended
TPFollowers[/url]
